content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill has no fuel
- Stone furnace has no fuel

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0) 
- Stone furnace has no ingredients

### Inserter for copper plates at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of following entities
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter is waiting for source items

### Inserter for copper plates at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)
Consists of following entities
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)
- Burner inserter has no fuel

- Transport belt is working

### Transport belt at position(x=64.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt is working


# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities have no fuel
- Ensure that entities which require fuel have a sufficient fuel supply before attempting to use them
- Regularly check the status of entities to prevent fuel depletion

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that entities which require ingredients have a sufficient ingredient supply before attempting to use them
- Regularly check the status of entities to prevent ingredient depletion

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that entities which require connection are properly connected before attempting to use them
- Regularly check the status of entities to prevent disconnection

### Errors when entities are not plugged into electric network
- Ensure that entities which require electric network are properly plugged in before attempting to use them
- Regularly check the status of entities to prevent disconnection from electric network

### Errors when inserter has no source items
- Ensure that inserter has source items before attempting to use it
- Regularly check the status of inserter to prevent depletion of source items


# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
